mapper.select:
/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getStoreList */
SELECT '[' || tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD || '] ' || tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM AS HQ_OFFICE_CD_NM, tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, SUBSTR(tms.BIZ_NO,0,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(tms.BIZ_NO,4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(tms.BIZ_NO,6,5) AS BIZ_NO, tms.AREA_CD, NVL(tms.CLS_FG, tho.CLS_FG) AS CLS_FG, NVL(tms.SYS_STAT_FG, tho.SYS_STAT_FG) AS SYS_STAT_FG, tho.SYS_STAT_FG AS HQ_SYS_STAT_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tms.SYS_OPEN_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS SYS_OPEN_DATE, tms.VAN_CD, tcvc.VAN_NM, tms.AGENCY_CD, tca.AGENCY_NM, tms.ADDR, tms.LATITUDE, tms.LONGITUDE
FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE tho, TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_CM_VAN_CMPNY tcvc, TB_CM_AGENCY tca WHERE tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD is not null AND tcvc.VAN_CD = tms.VAN_CD AND tcvc.VAN_FG = '01' AND tca.AGENCY_CD = tms.AGENCY_CD
AND (tca.AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd} OR tca.P_AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd})
AND UPPER(tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{hqOfficeCd})||'%'
AND tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%'||#{hqOfficeNm}||'%'
AND UPPER(tms.STORE_CD) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{storeCd})||'%'
AND tms.STORE_NM LIKE '%'||#{storeNm}||'%'
AND tms.BIZ_NO LIKE '%'||#{bizNo}||'%'
AND tms.CLS_FG = #{clsFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tms.SYS_STAT_FG = #{sysStatFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND tms.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{storeHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 매장브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 매장브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND tms.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
ORDER BY tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tms.STORE_CD, tms.SYS_OPEN_DATE ASC

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getStoreDetail */
SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tms.OWNER_NM, tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM, tms.HQ_BRAND_CD, tms.BIZ_STORE_NM, tms.BIZ_NO, SUBSTR(tms.BIZ_NO, 0, 3) AS BIZ_NO1, SUBSTR(tms.BIZ_NO, 4, 2) AS BIZ_NO2, SUBSTR(tms.BIZ_NO, 6, 5) AS BIZ_NO3, tms.TEL_NO, tms.FAX_NO, tms.MP_NO, tms.EMAIL_ADDR, tms.HMPG_ADDR, tms.POST_NO, tms.ADDR, tms.ADDR_DTL, tms.AREA_CD, tms.AGENCY_CD, tca.AGENCY_NM, tms.VAN_CD, tcvc.VAN_NM, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, tms.SYS_OPEN_DATE, tms.SYS_CLOSURE_DATE, tms.CLS_FG, tms.REMARK, tms.SYS_REMARK, tms.HD_REMARK, tms.DIRECT_MANAGE_YN, tms.MAP_STORE_CD, tms.LATITUDE, tms.LONGITUDE, tms.BRANCH_CD, tmsi.MOMS_TEAM, tmsi.MOMS_AC_SHOP, tmsi.MOMS_AREA_FG, tmsi.MOMS_COMMERCIAL, tmsi.MOMS_SHOP_TYPE, tmsi.MOMS_STORE_MANAGE_TYPE, NVL((SELECT ENVST_VAL FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '1250' AND USE_YN = 'Y'), '0') AS ENVST_1250, tms.SITE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_HQ_OFFICE tho, TB_CM_AGENCY tca, TB_CM_VAN_CMPNY tcvc, TB_MS_STORE_INFO tmsi WHERE tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tca.AGENCY_CD = tms.AGENCY_CD AND tcvc.VAN_CD = tms.VAN_CD AND tcvc.VAN_FG = '01' -- VAN만 AND tmsi.STORE_CD (+)= tms.STORE_CD

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getStoreEnvInfo */
SELECT '['||tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD||'] '||thq.HQ_OFFICE_NM AS HQ_OFFICE_NM, '['||tms.STORE_CD||'] '||tms.STORE_NM AS STORE_NM, tcm.NMCODE_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_HQ_OFFICE thq, TB_CM_NMCODE tcm WHERE thq.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tcm.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '005' AND tms.CLS_FG = tcm.NMCODE_CD

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getStorePosInfo */
SELECT tmp.POS_NO, tmp.POS_FG, tmp.ENVST_CD, tmp.ENVST_VAL, tcd.ENVST_VAL_NM FROM TB_MS_POS_ENVST tmp, TB_CM_ENVST_DTL tcd WHERE tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.ENVST_CD = '4018' AND tmp.ENVST_CD = tcd.ENVST_CD AND tmp.ENVST_VAL = tcd.ENVST_VAL_CD

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getStorePrintInfo */
SELECT tmp.PRTER_NO, tcd.ENVST_VAL_NM FROM TB_MS_PRINTER tmp, TB_CM_ENVST_DTL tcd WHERE tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tcd.ENVST_VAL_CD = tmp.PRTER_KIND_FG AND tcd.ENVST_CD = '4030'
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.saveStoreInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_STORE ( STORE_CD, STORE_NM, OWNER_NM, HQ_OFFICE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, BIZ_NO, BIZ_STORE_NM, TEL_NO, FAX_NO, MP_NO, EMAIL_ADDR, HMPG_ADDR, POST_NO, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, AREA_CD, CLS_FG, SYS_STAT_FG, SYS_OPEN_DATE, SYS_CLOSURE_DATE, VAN_CD, AGENCY_CD, REMARK, SYS_REMARK, HD_REMARK, DIRECT_MANAGE_YN, MAP_STORE_CD, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, BRANCH_CD, SITE_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{storeNm}, #{ownerNm}, #{hqOfficeCd}, #{hqBrandCd}, #{bizNo}, #{bizStoreNm}, #{telNo}, #{faxNo}, #{mpNo}, #{emailAddr}, #{hmpgAddr}, #{postNo}, #{addr}, NVL(#{addrDtl}, ' '), #{areaCd}, #{clsFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysStatFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysOpenDate}, #{sysClosureDate}, #{vanCd}, #{agencyCd}, #{remark}, #{sysRemark}, #{hdRemark}, #{directManageYn}, #{mapStoreCd}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{branchCd}, #{siteCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.update: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.updateStoreInfo */ UPDATE TB_MS_STORE SET STORE_NM = #{storeNm}, OWNER_NM = #{ownerNm}, HQ_BRAND_CD = #{hqBrandCd}, BIZ_NO = #{bizNo}, BIZ_STORE_NM = #{bizStoreNm}, TEL_NO = #{telNo}, FAX_NO = #{faxNo}, MP_NO = #{mpNo}, EMAIL_ADDR = #{emailAddr}, HMPG_ADDR = #{hmpgAddr}, POST_NO = #{postNo}, ADDR = #{addr}, ADDR_DTL = NVL(#{addrDtl}, ' '), AREA_CD = #{areaCd}, CLS_FG = #{clsFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_STAT_FG = #{sysStatFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_OPEN_DATE = #{sysOpenDate}, SYS_CLOSURE_DATE = #{sysClosureDate}, VAN_CD = #{vanCd}, AGENCY_CD = #{agencyCd}, REMARK = #{remark}, SYS_REMARK = #{sysRemark}, HD_REMARK = #{hdRemark}, DIRECT_MANAGE_YN = #{directManageYn}, MAP_STORE_CD = #{mapStoreCd}, LATITUDE = #{latitude}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude}, BRANCH_CD = #{branchCd}, SITE_CD = #{siteCd}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyClsInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS ( STORE_CD, PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_CLASS_NM, P_PROD_CLASS_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, CLS_LEVEL_CD ) SELECT #{storeCd}, PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_CLASS_NM, P_PROD_CLASS_CD, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, CLS_LEVEL_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreDefaultUser */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_EMPLOYEE ( STORE_CD, EMP_NO, EMP_NM, EMP_PWD, WEB_USE_YN, USER_ID, MP_NO, EMAIL_ADDR, POST_NO, ADDR, ADDR_DTL, SERVICE_FG, SMS_RECV_YN, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{posEmpNo}, #{ownerNm}, #{posUserPwd}, 'Y', #{userId}, #{telNo}, #{emailAddr}, #{postNo}, #{addr}, NVL(#{addrDtl}, ' '), '1', 'N', 'Y', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreWebUser */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_USER_INFO ( USER_ID, USER_PWD, AUTH_GRP_CD, LOGIN_FAIL_CNT, LAST_PWD_CHG_DT, USER_STAT_FG, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, (SELECT FN_TB_WB_AUTHOR_GRP_USE_CD(#{storeCd}, 'S') FROM DUAL), 0, #{regDt}, '99', 'Y', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertDefaultPrintTemplete */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRINT_TEMPL ( STORE_CD, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, TEMPLT_NM, PRT_FORM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, PRT_CLASS_CD, 'C' AS TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, TEMPLT_NM, PRT_FORM, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_CM_PRINT_TEMPL

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertDefaultPrint */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRINT ( STORE_CD, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, PRT_FORM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, PRT_CLASS_CD, 'C' AS TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, PRT_FORM, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_CM_PRINT_TEMPL WHERE TEMPLT_CD = '001'

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertHqPrintTemplete */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRINT_TEMPL ( STORE_CD, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, TEMPLT_NM, PRT_FORM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, TEMPLT_NM, PRT_FORM, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_HQ_PRINT_TEMPL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertHqPrint */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRINT ( STORE_CD, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, PRT_FORM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, PRT_CLASS_CD, TEMPLT_REG_FG, TEMPLT_CD, PRT_FORM, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_HQ_PRINT_TEMPL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TEMPLT_CD = '001' AND ( TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'C' OR ( TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'H' AND PRT_CLASS_CD NOT IN ( SELECT PRT_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRINT_TEMPL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND TEMPLT_CD = '001' AND TEMPLT_REG_FG = 'C')))

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertPosInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_POS ( STORE_CD, POS_NO, POS_NM, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, LPAD(#{posNo}, 2, '0'), LPAD(#{posNo}, 2, '0'), 'Y', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreCorner */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_CORNER ( STORE_CD, CORNR_CD, CORNR_NM, OWNER_NM, BIZ_NO, TEL_NO, VAN_CD, VAN_TERMNL_NO, VAN_SER_NO, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, CORNR_CD, CORNR_NM, OWNER_NM, BIZ_NO, TEL_NO, VAN_CD, VAN_TERMNL_NO, VAN_SER_NO, #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_CORNER WHERE STORE_CD = '0000000' AND CORNR_CD = '01'

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStorage */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORAGE A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , '001' AS STORAGE_CD , '기본창고' AS STORAGE_NM , 'Y' AS USE_YN , #{hqOfficeCd} AS HQ_OFFICE_CD FROM DUAL B UNION ALL SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , '000' AS STORAGE_CD , '매대' AS STORAGE_NM , 'Y' AS USE_YN , #{hqOfficeCd} AS HQ_OFFICE_CD FROM DUAL B ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.STORAGE_CD = B.STORAGE_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.STORAGE_NM = B.STORAGE_NM , A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN , A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = B.HQ_OFFICE_CD WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.STORAGE_CD , A.STORAGE_NM , A.USE_YN , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.HQ_OFFICE_CD ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.STORAGE_CD , B.STORAGE_NM , B.USE_YN , #{regDt} , #{regId} , #{modDt} , #{modId} , B.HQ_OFFICE_CD )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertMemberClass */ INSERT INTO TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS ( MEMBR_ORGN_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_NM, DC_RATE, POINT_SAVE_FG, DEFLT_YN, NEW_JOIN_SAVE_POINT, FIRST_SALE_SAVE_POINT, MIN_USE_POINT, ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG, ANVSR_SAVE_POINT, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{membrOrgnCd}, MEMBR_CLASS_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_NM, DC_RATE, POINT_SAVE_FG, DEFLT_YN, NEW_JOIN_SAVE_POINT, FIRST_SALE_SAVE_POINT, MIN_USE_POINT, ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG, ANVSR_SAVE_POINT, USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = '0000000' AND MEMBR_CLASS_CD = '000'

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertTbMsPayMethodClass */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PAY_METHOD_CLASS A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PAY_TYPE_FG , PAY_CLASS_CD , PAY_CLASS_NM , PAY_VENDOR_CD , SER_NO_YN , USE_YN , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID , MAPPING_CODE FROM TB_HQ_PAY_METHOD_CLASS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND PAY_TYPE_FG IN ('1', '3') ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PAY_TYPE_FG = B.PAY_TYPE_FG AND A.PAY_CLASS_CD = B.PAY_CLASS_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.PAY_CLASS_NM = B.PAY_CLASS_NM , A.PAY_VENDOR_CD = B.PAY_VENDOR_CD , A.SER_NO_YN = B.SER_NO_YN , A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN , A.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID , A.MAPPING_CODE = B.MAPPING_CODE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PAY_TYPE_FG , A.PAY_CLASS_CD , A.PAY_CLASS_NM , A.PAY_VENDOR_CD , A.SER_NO_YN , A.USE_YN , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.MAPPING_CODE ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PAY_TYPE_FG , B.PAY_CLASS_CD , B.PAY_CLASS_NM , B.PAY_VENDOR_CD , B.SER_NO_YN , B.USE_YN , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID , B.MAPPING_CODE )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertTbMsGift */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_GIFT A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , GIFT_CD , GIFT_NM , PAY_CLASS_CD , GIFT_UPRC , USE_YN , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_GIFT WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.GIFT_CD = B.GIFT_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.GIFT_NM = B.GIFT_NM , A.PAY_CLASS_CD = B.PAY_CLASS_CD , A.GIFT_UPRC = B.GIFT_UPRC , A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN , A.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.GIFT_CD , A.GIFT_NM , A.PAY_CLASS_CD , A.GIFT_UPRC , A.USE_YN , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.GIFT_CD , B.GIFT_NM , B.PAY_CLASS_CD , B.GIFT_UPRC , B.USE_YN , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertTbMsCoupon */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_COUPON A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , 'H' AS COUPN_REG_FG , PAY_CLASS_CD , COUPN_CD , COUPN_NM , COUPN_DC_FG , COUPN_DC_RATE , COUPN_DC_AMT , START_DATE , END_DATE , COUPN_APPLY_FG , COUPN_TARGET_FG , COUPN_PROD_FG , 'N' AS USE_YN , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID , DISP_SEQ_NO FROM TB_HQ_COUPON WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.COUPN_REG_FG = B.COUPN_REG_FG AND A.PAY_CLASS_CD = B.PAY_CLASS_CD AND A.COUPN_CD = B.COUPN_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.COUPN_NM = B.COUPN_NM , A.COUPN_DC_FG = B.COUPN_DC_FG , A.COUPN_DC_RATE = B.COUPN_DC_RATE , A.COUPN_DC_AMT = B.COUPN_DC_AMT , A.START_DATE = B.START_DATE , A.END_DATE = B.END_DATE , A.COUPN_APPLY_FG = B.COUPN_APPLY_FG , A.COUPN_TARGET_FG = B.COUPN_TARGET_FG , A.COUPN_PROD_FG = B.COUPN_PROD_FG , A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN , A.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID , A.DISP_SEQ_NO = B.DISP_SEQ_NO WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.COUPN_REG_FG , A.PAY_CLASS_CD , A.COUPN_CD , A.COUPN_NM , A.COUPN_DC_FG , A.COUPN_DC_RATE , A.COUPN_DC_AMT , A.START_DATE , A.END_DATE , A.COUPN_APPLY_FG , A.COUPN_TARGET_FG , A.COUPN_PROD_FG , A.USE_YN , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.DISP_SEQ_NO ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.COUPN_REG_FG , B.PAY_CLASS_CD , B.COUPN_CD , B.COUPN_NM , B.COUPN_DC_FG , B.COUPN_DC_RATE , B.COUPN_DC_AMT , B.START_DATE , B.END_DATE , B.COUPN_APPLY_FG , B.COUPN_TARGET_FG , B.COUPN_PROD_FG , B.USE_YN , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID , B.DISP_SEQ_NO )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertTbMsCouponProd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_COUPON_PROD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , 'H' AS COUPN_REG_FG , PAY_CLASS_CD , COUPN_CD , PROD_CD , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_COUPON_PROD WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.COUPN_REG_FG = B.COUPN_REG_FG AND A.PAY_CLASS_CD = B.PAY_CLASS_CD AND A.COUPN_CD = B.COUPN_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.COUPN_REG_FG , A.PAY_CLASS_CD , A.COUPN_CD , A.PROD_CD , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.COUPN_REG_FG , B.PAY_CLASS_CD , B.COUPN_CD , B.PROD_CD , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertHqCouponStore */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_COUPON_STORE ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, PAY_CLASS_CD, COUPN_CD, STORE_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{hqOfficeCd}, PAY_CLASS_CD, COUPN_CD, STORE_CD, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_COUPON WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertTabGroup */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_TABLE_GROUP ( STORE_CD, TBL_GRP_CD, TBL_GRP_NM, TBL_GRP_FG, BG_IMG_NM, DISP_SEQ, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, TBL_GRP_CD, TBL_GRP_NM, TBL_GRP_FG, BG_IMG_NM, DISP_SEQ, USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_TABLE_GROUP WHERE STORE_CD = '0000000'

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreEnvInfo */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORE_ENVST A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, ENVST_CD AS ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL AS ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN AS DIRCT_IN_YN, USE_YN AS USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_STORE_ENVST WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND ENVST_CD IN (SELECT ENVST_CD FROM TB_CM_ENVST WHERE ENVST_FG = '00') -- 매장환경(공통) ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.ENVST_CD = B.ENVST_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.ENVST_VAL = B.ENVST_VAL, A.DIRCT_IN_YN = B.DIRCT_IN_YN, A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN, A.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.ENVST_CD, A.ENVST_VAL, A.DIRCT_IN_YN, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.ENVST_CD, B.ENVST_VAL, B.DIRCT_IN_YN, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.updateStoreEnvst */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORE_ENVST tmse USING DUAL ON ( tmse.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmse.ENVST_CD = #{envstCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmse.ENVST_VAL = #{envstVal}, tmse.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tmse.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{envstCd}, #{envstVal}, 'N', 'N', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertFoodEnvInfo */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORE_ENVST A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, ENVST_CD AS ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL AS ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN AS DIRCT_IN_YN, USE_YN AS USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_STORE_ENVST WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND ENVST_CD IN (SELECT ENVST_CD FROM TB_CM_ENVST WHERE ENVST_FG = '01') ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.ENVST_CD = B.ENVST_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.ENVST_VAL = B.ENVST_VAL, A.DIRCT_IN_YN = B.DIRCT_IN_YN, A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN, A.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.ENVST_CD, A.ENVST_VAL, A.DIRCT_IN_YN, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.ENVST_CD, B.ENVST_VAL, B.DIRCT_IN_YN, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertPosEnvInfo */
MERGE INTO TB_MS_POS_ENVST A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , POS_NO AS POS_NO , ENVST_CD AS ENVST_CD , ENVST_VAL AS ENVST_VAL , DIRCT_IN_YN AS DIRCT_IN_YN , POS_FG AS POS_FG , USE_YN AS USE_YN FROM TB_MS_POS_ENVST WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND POS_NO IN (SELECT POS_NO FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd}) ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.POS_NO = A.POS_NO AND B.ENVST_CD = A.ENVST_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.ENVST_VAL = B.ENVST_VAL , A.DIRCT_IN_YN = B.DIRCT_IN_YN , A.POS_FG = B.POS_FG , A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN , A.MOD_DT = #{modDt} , A.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.POS_NO , A.ENVST_CD , A.ENVST_VAL , A.DIRCT_IN_YN , A.POS_FG , A.USE_YN , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.POS_NO , B.ENVST_CD , B.ENVST_VAL , B.DIRCT_IN_YN , B.POS_FG , B.USE_YN , #{regDt} , #{regId} , #{modDt} , #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertPosFunKeyInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_POS_FNKEY ( STORE_CD, POS_NO, FNKEY_NO, FNKEY_FG, DISP_SEQ, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, POS_NO, FNKEY_NO, FNKEY_FG, DISP_SEQ, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, '01', USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_POS_FNKEY WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND POS_NO IN (SELECT POS_NO FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd})

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertKitchenPrintEnvInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRINTER ( STORE_CD, PRTER_NO, PRTER_NM, POS_NO, PRTER_KIND_FG, PRTER_PORT_FG, PRTER_SPEED_FG, PRTER_NET_IP, PRTER_NET_PORT, PRTER_OUTPUT_QTY, USE_YN, PRTER_FG, PRTER_LABEL_KIND_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, PRTER_NO, PRTER_NM, POS_NO, PRTER_KIND_FG, PRTER_PORT_FG, PRTER_SPEED_FG, PRTER_NET_IP, PRTER_NET_PORT, PRTER_OUTPUT_QTY, USE_YN, PRTER_FG, PRTER_LABEL_KIND_FG, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_PRINTER WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND POS_NO IN (SELECT POS_NO FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd})

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreProductClass */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_CLASS_NM, P_PROD_CLASS_CD, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, CLS_LEVEL_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CLASS_CD = B.PROD_CLASS_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PROD_CLASS_NM = B.PROD_CLASS_NM, P_PROD_CLASS_CD = B.P_PROD_CLASS_CD, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CLASS_CD, A.PROD_CLASS_NM, A.P_PROD_CLASS_CD, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.CLS_LEVEL_CD ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_NM, B.P_PROD_CLASS_CD, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.CLS_LEVEL_CD )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductClass */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CLASS_CD, PROD_CLASS_NM, P_PROD_CLASS_CD, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, CLS_LEVEL_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CLASS_CD = B.PROD_CLASS_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PROD_CLASS_NM = B.PROD_CLASS_NM, P_PROD_CLASS_CD = B.P_PROD_CLASS_CD, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CLASS_CD, A.PROD_CLASS_NM, A.P_PROD_CLASS_CD, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.CLS_LEVEL_CD ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_CD, B.PROD_CLASS_NM, B.P_PROD_CLASS_CD, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.CLS_LEVEL_CD )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreSaleUprc */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, tmpsp.PROD_CD, tmpsp.SALE_PRC_FG, tmpsp.START_DATE, tmpsp.END_DATE, tmpsp.SALE_UPRC, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, tmpsp.STIN_SALE_UPRC, tmpsp.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, tmpsp.PACK_SALE_UPRC, tmpsp.SALE_RESVE_FG FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE tmpsp, TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE 1=1 AND tmpsp.STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.PROD_CD = tmpsp.PROD_CD ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND A.SALE_PRC_FG = B.SALE_PRC_FG AND A.START_DATE = B.START_DATE ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET END_DATE = B.END_DATE, SALE_UPRC = B.SALE_UPRC, STIN_SALE_UPRC = B.STIN_SALE_UPRC, DLVR_SALE_UPRC = B.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, PACK_SALE_UPRC = B.PACK_SALE_UPRC, SALE_RESVE_FG = B.SALE_RESVE_FG, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.SALE_PRC_FG, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.SALE_UPRC, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.STIN_SALE_UPRC, A.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, A.PACK_SALE_UPRC, A.SALE_RESVE_FG ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.SALE_PRC_FG, B.START_DATE, B.END_DATE, B.SALE_UPRC, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.STIN_SALE_UPRC, B.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, B.PACK_SALE_UPRC, B.SALE_RESVE_FG )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqSaleUprc */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, SALE_PRC_FG, START_DATE, END_DATE, SALE_UPRC, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, STIN_SALE_UPRC, DLVR_SALE_UPRC, PACK_SALE_UPRC FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND A.SALE_PRC_FG = B.SALE_PRC_FG AND A.START_DATE = B.START_DATE ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET END_DATE = B.END_DATE, SALE_UPRC = B.SALE_UPRC, STIN_SALE_UPRC = B.STIN_SALE_UPRC, DLVR_SALE_UPRC = B.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, PACK_SALE_UPRC = B.PACK_SALE_UPRC, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.SALE_PRC_FG, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, A.SALE_UPRC, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.STIN_SALE_UPRC, A.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, A.PACK_SALE_UPRC ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.SALE_PRC_FG, B.START_DATE, B.END_DATE, B.SALE_UPRC, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.STIN_SALE_UPRC, B.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, B.PACK_SALE_UPRC )
mapper.update: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreSplyUprc */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, PROD_NM, HQ_BRAND_CD, PROD_CLASS_CD, CORNR_CD, ORGPLCE_CD, SDATTR_CLASS_CD, SDSEL_GRP_CD, POINT_SAVE_YN, PROD_DC_FG, VAT_FG, PROD_TIP_YN, PROD_PACK_AMT, PROD_DLVR_AMT, PROD_TYPE_FG, SALE_PROD_YN, STOCK_PROD_YN, SIDE_PROD_YN, SET_PROD_FG, PRC_CTRL_FG, COST_UPRC, LAST_COST_UPRC, SPLY_UPRC, SPLY_UPRC_USE_YN, PO_PROD_FG, PO_UNIT_FG, PO_UNIT_QTY, PO_UNIT_ALLOW_FG, PO_MIN_QTY, SAFE_STOCK_QTY, STOCK_UNIT_FG, USE_YN, REMARK, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, REG_FG, MAP_PROD_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SPLY_UPRC = B.SPLY_UPRC, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreBarcd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, BARCD_CD, BARCD_NM, UNIT_QTY, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND A.BARCD_CD = B.BARCD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET BARCD_NM = B.BARCD_NM, UNIT_QTY = B.UNIT_QTY, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.BARCD_CD, A.BARCD_NM, A.UNIT_QTY, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.BARCD_CD, B.BARCD_NM, B.UNIT_QTY, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqBarcd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_BARCD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, BARCD_CD, BARCD_NM, UNIT_QTY, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_BARCD WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND A.BARCD_CD = B.BARCD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET BARCD_NM = B.BARCD_NM, UNIT_QTY = B.UNIT_QTY, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.BARCD_CD, A.BARCD_NM, A.UNIT_QTY, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.BARCD_CD, B.BARCD_NM, B.UNIT_QTY, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqSdattrClass */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDATTR_CLASS A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, HQ_BRAND_CD, SDATTR_CLASS_CD, SDATTR_CLASS_NM, USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDATTR_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.SDATTR_CLASS_CD = B.SDATTR_CLASS_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MS_BRAND_CD = B.HQ_BRAND_CD, SDATTR_CLASS_NM = B.SDATTR_CLASS_NM, USE_YN = B.USE_YN, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.MS_BRAND_CD, A.SDATTR_CLASS_CD, A.SDATTR_CLASS_NM, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.HQ_BRAND_CD, B.SDATTR_CLASS_CD, B.SDATTR_CLASS_NM, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreSdselGroup */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, MS_BRAND_CD, SDSEL_GRP_CD, SDSEL_GRP_NM, USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, RCVKIND, FIX_PROD_FG, SDSEL_TYPE_FG FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.SDSEL_GRP_CD = B.SDSEL_GRP_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MS_BRAND_CD = B.MS_BRAND_CD, SDSEL_GRP_NM = B.SDSEL_GRP_NM, USE_YN = B.USE_YN, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, RCVKIND = B.RCVKIND, FIX_PROD_FG = B.FIX_PROD_FG, SDSEL_TYPE_FG = B.SDSEL_TYPE_FG WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.MS_BRAND_CD, A.SDSEL_GRP_CD, A.SDSEL_GRP_NM, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.RCVKIND, A.FIX_PROD_FG, A.SDSEL_TYPE_FG ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.MS_BRAND_CD, B.SDSEL_GRP_CD, B.SDSEL_GRP_NM, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.RCVKIND, B.FIX_PROD_FG, B.SDSEL_TYPE_FG )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreSdselClass */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, SDSEL_CLASS_CD, SDSEL_CLASS_NM, SDSEL_GRP_CD, DISP_SEQ, SDSEL_QTY, USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, MAP_CLASS_CD, RCVKIND, REQUIRE_YN FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND A.SDSEL_GRP_CD = B.SDSEL_GRP_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SDSEL_CLASS_NM = B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM, SDSEL_QTY = B.SDSEL_QTY, DISP_SEQ = B.DISP_SEQ, USE_YN = B.USE_YN, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, MAP_CLASS_CD = B.MAP_CLASS_CD, RCVKIND = B.RCVKIND, REQUIRE_YN = B.REQUIRE_YN WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, A.SDSEL_CLASS_NM, A.SDSEL_GRP_CD, A.DISP_SEQ, A.SDSEL_QTY, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.MAP_CLASS_CD, A.RCVKIND, A.REQUIRE_YN ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_NM, B.SDSEL_GRP_CD, B.DISP_SEQ, B.SDSEL_QTY, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.MAP_CLASS_CD, B.RCVKIND, B.REQUIRE_YN )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreSdselProd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, SDSEL_CLASS_CD, PROD_CD, ADD_PROD_UPRC, ADD_PROD_QTY, DISP_SEQ, USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, RCVKIND, FIX_PROD_FG, SOLD_OUT_YN FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SDSEL_PROD WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.SDSEL_CLASS_CD = B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ADD_PROD_UPRC = B.ADD_PROD_UPRC, ADD_PROD_QTY = B.ADD_PROD_QTY, DISP_SEQ = B.DISP_SEQ, USE_YN = B.USE_YN, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, RCVKIND = B.RCVKIND, FIX_PROD_FG = B.FIX_PROD_FG, SOLD_OUT_YN = B.SOLD_OUT_YN WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.ADD_PROD_UPRC, A.ADD_PROD_QTY, A.DISP_SEQ, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.RCVKIND, A.FIX_PROD_FG, A.SOLD_OUT_YN ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.ADD_PROD_UPRC, B.ADD_PROD_QTY, B.DISP_SEQ, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.RCVKIND, B.FIX_PROD_FG, B.SOLD_OUT_YN )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqOptionGroup */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_OPTION_GROUP A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, OPTION_GRP_CD, OPTION_GRP_NM, USE_YN, 'H' AS REG_FG, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_OPTION_GROUP WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.OPTION_GRP_CD = B.OPTION_GRP_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET OPTION_GRP_NM = B.OPTION_GRP_NM, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.OPTION_GRP_CD, A.OPTION_GRP_NM, A.USE_YN, A.REG_FG, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.OPTION_GRP_CD, B.OPTION_GRP_NM, B.USE_YN, B.REG_FG, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqOptionVal */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_OPTION_VAL A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, OPTION_GRP_CD, OPTION_VAL_CD, OPTION_VAL_NM, 'H' AS REG_FG, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, OPT_PROD_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_OPTION_VAL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.OPTION_GRP_CD = B.OPTION_GRP_CD AND A.OPTION_VAL_CD = B.OPTION_VAL_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, OPT_PROD_CD = B.OPT_PROD_CD WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.OPTION_GRP_CD, A.OPTION_VAL_CD, A.OPTION_VAL_NM, A.REG_FG, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.OPT_PROD_CD ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.OPTION_GRP_CD, B.OPTION_VAL_CD, B.OPTION_VAL_NM, B.REG_FG, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.OPT_PROD_CD )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreProdInfo */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_INFO A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, PROD_INFO, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, NU_TOT_WT, NU_KCAL, NU_PROTEIN, NU_SODIUM, NU_SUGARS, NU_SAT_FAT, NU_CAFFEINE, MOMS_KIOSK_EDGE, SALE_TYPE_YN_SIN, SALE_TYPE_YN_DLV, SALE_TYPE_YN_PKG, SALE_CHN_YN_POS, SALE_CHN_YN_KSK, SALE_CHN_YN_CMP, SALE_CHN_YN_BAE, SALE_CHN_YN_BAO, SALE_CHN_YN_YGY, SALE_CHN_YN_YGE, SALE_CHN_YN_CPN, SALE_CHN_YN_TNG, SALE_CHN_YN_DDN FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET PROD_INFO = B.PROD_INFO, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, NU_TOT_WT = B.NU_TOT_WT, NU_KCAL = B.NU_KCAL, NU_PROTEIN = B.NU_PROTEIN, NU_SODIUM = B.NU_SODIUM, NU_SUGARS = B.NU_SUGARS, NU_SAT_FAT = B.NU_SAT_FAT, NU_CAFFEINE = B.NU_CAFFEINE, MOMS_KIOSK_EDGE = B.MOMS_KIOSK_EDGE, SALE_TYPE_YN_SIN = B.SALE_TYPE_YN_SIN, SALE_TYPE_YN_DLV = B.SALE_TYPE_YN_DLV, SALE_TYPE_YN_PKG = B.SALE_TYPE_YN_PKG, SALE_CHN_YN_POS = B.SALE_CHN_YN_POS, SALE_CHN_YN_KSK = B.SALE_CHN_YN_KSK, SALE_CHN_YN_CMP = B.SALE_CHN_YN_CMP, SALE_CHN_YN_BAE = B.SALE_CHN_YN_BAE, SALE_CHN_YN_BAO = B.SALE_CHN_YN_BAO, SALE_CHN_YN_YGY = B.SALE_CHN_YN_YGY, SALE_CHN_YN_YGE = B.SALE_CHN_YN_YGE, SALE_CHN_YN_CPN = B.SALE_CHN_YN_CPN, SALE_CHN_YN_TNG = B.SALE_CHN_YN_TNG, SALE_CHN_YN_DDN = B.SALE_CHN_YN_DDN WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.PROD_INFO, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.NU_TOT_WT, A.NU_KCAL, A.NU_PROTEIN, A.NU_SODIUM, A.NU_SUGARS, A.NU_SAT_FAT, A.NU_CAFFEINE, A.MOMS_KIOSK_EDGE, A.SALE_TYPE_YN_SIN, A.SALE_TYPE_YN_DLV, A.SALE_TYPE_YN_PKG, A.SALE_CHN_YN_POS, A.SALE_CHN_YN_KSK, A.SALE_CHN_YN_CMP, A.SALE_CHN_YN_BAE, A.SALE_CHN_YN_BAO, A.SALE_CHN_YN_YGY, A.SALE_CHN_YN_YGE, A.SALE_CHN_YN_CPN, A.SALE_CHN_YN_TNG, A.SALE_CHN_YN_DDN ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.PROD_INFO, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.NU_TOT_WT, B.NU_KCAL, B.NU_PROTEIN, B.NU_SODIUM, B.NU_SUGARS, B.NU_SAT_FAT, B.NU_CAFFEINE, B.MOMS_KIOSK_EDGE, B.SALE_TYPE_YN_SIN, B.SALE_TYPE_YN_DLV, B.SALE_TYPE_YN_PKG, B.SALE_CHN_YN_POS, B.SALE_CHN_YN_KSK, B.SALE_CHN_YN_CMP, B.SALE_CHN_YN_BAE, B.SALE_CHN_YN_BAO, B.SALE_CHN_YN_YGY, B.SALE_CHN_YN_YGE, B.SALE_CHN_YN_CPN, B.SALE_CHN_YN_TNG, B.SALE_CHN_YN_DDN )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreSaleTime */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_TIME A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, TIME_SEQ, INCLUDE_FG, S_SALE_TIME, E_SALE_TIME, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_TIME WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND A.TIME_SEQ = B.TIME_SEQ ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET INCLUDE_FG = B.INCLUDE_FG, S_SALE_TIME = B.S_SALE_TIME, E_SALE_TIME = B.E_SALE_TIME, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.INCLUDE_FG, A.S_SALE_TIME, A.E_SALE_TIME, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.INCLUDE_FG, B.S_SALE_TIME, B.E_SALE_TIME, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductStore */ MERGE INTO TB_HQ_PRODUCT_STORE A USING ( SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = B.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.HQ_OFFICE_CD, A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.HQ_OFFICE_CD, B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreProductStore */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_PRODUCT_STORE ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, STORE_CD, PROD_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{hqOfficeCd} AS HQ_OFFICE_CD, #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_STORE WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{copyHqOfficeCd} AND STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyStoreFnkey */
MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORE_FNKEY A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, tmsf.FNKEY_NO, tmsf.FNKEY_NM, tmsf.FNKEY_FG, tmsf.POS_FG, tmsf.AUTH_YN, tmsf.IMG_FILE_NM, tmsf.DISP_SEQ, tmsf.POSI_ADJ_YN, tmsf.USE_YN FROM TB_MS_STORE_FNKEY tmsf WHERE tmsf.STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( B.FNKEY_NO = A.FNKEY_NO AND B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.FNKEY_NM = B.FNKEY_NM, A.FNKEY_FG = B.FNKEY_FG, A.POS_FG = B.POS_FG, A.AUTH_YN = B.AUTH_YN, A.IMG_FILE_NM = B.IMG_FILE_NM, A.DISP_SEQ = B.DISP_SEQ, A.POSI_ADJ_YN = B.POSI_ADJ_YN, A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN, A.REG_DT = #{regDt}, A.REG_ID = #{regId}, A.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, A.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, FNKEY_NO, FNKEY_NM, FNKEY_FG, POS_FG, AUTH_YN, IMG_FILE_NM, DISP_SEQ, POSI_ADJ_YN, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.FNKEY_NO, B.FNKEY_NM, B.FNKEY_FG, B.POS_FG, B.AUTH_YN, B.IMG_FILE_NM, B.DISP_SEQ, B.POSI_ADJ_YN, B.USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyStoreConfXml */
INSERT INTO TB_WB_STORE_CONFG_XML ( STORE_CD, CONFG_FG, XML, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, GRP_CD ) SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, twscx.CONFG_FG, twscx.XML, twscx.USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, twscx.GRP_CD FROM TB_WB_STORE_CONFG_XML twscx WHERE twscx.STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND twscx.CONFG_FG = #{confgFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPosConfXml */ MERGE INTO TB_WB_POS_CONFG_XML A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, A.T_POS_NO AS POS_NO, B.CONFG_FG, B.XML, B.USE_YN, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM ( SELECT C.POS_NO AS T_POS_NO, (CASE WHEN C.POS_NO > #{copyStorePosMax} THEN #{copyStorePosMax} ELSE C.POS_NO END) AS O_POS_NO FROM TB_MS_POS C WHERE C.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ) A, TB_WB_POS_CONFG_XML B WHERE 1=1 AND B.STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND B.POS_NO = A.O_POS_NO AND B.CONFG_FG = #{confgFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO AND A.CONFG_FG = B.CONFG_FG ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET XML = B.XML, USE_YN = B.USE_YN, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.POS_NO, A.CONFG_FG, A.XML, A.USE_YN, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.POS_NO, B.CONFG_FG, B.XML, B.USE_YN, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )
mapper.update: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.registPosFnkeyStore */ MERGE INTO TB_CM_POS_FNKEY_STORE tcpfs USING ( SELECT tmsf.FNKEY_NO, tmsf.FNKEY_FG, tmsf.STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE_FNKEY tmsf, TB_CM_POS_FNKEY tcpf WHERE tcpf.FNKEY_NO = tmsf.FNKEY_NO AND tcpf.FNKEY_FG = tmsf.FNKEY_FG AND tmsf.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ) tmsf ON( tcpfs.FNKEY_NO = tmsf.FNKEY_NO AND tcpfs.FNKEY_FG = tmsf.FNKEY_FG AND tcpfs.STORE_CD = tmsf.STORE_CD ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FNKEY_NO, FNKEY_FG, STORE_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( tmsf.FNKEY_NO, tmsf.FNKEY_FG, tmsf.STORE_CD, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.insert:
/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyFnkeyClassCopy */
INSERT INTO TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY_CLASS ( STORE_CD, TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_NM, PAGE_NO, PAGE_ROWS, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, tmtkc.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tmtkc.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tmtkc.TUKEY_CLASS_NM, tmtkc.PAGE_NO, tmtkc.PAGE_ROWS, tmtkc.X, tmtkc.Y, tmtkc.WIDTH, tmtkc.HEIGHT, tmtkc.STYLE_CD, tmtkc.FONT_SIZE, tmtkc.FONT_COLOR, tmtkc.FILL_COLOR, tmtkc.IMG_NM, tmtkc.IN_FG, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY_CLASS tmtkc WHERE tmtkc.STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyFnkeyGrpCopy */
INSERT INTO TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY_GROUP ( STORE_CD, TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_GRP_NM, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_GRP_NM, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY_GROUP WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyFnkeyCopy */
INSERT INTO TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY ( STORE_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CD, TUKEY_FG, PROD_CD, PAGE_NO, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, TUKEY_GRP_CD ) SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_FG, tmtk.PROD_CD, tmtk.PAGE_NO, tmtk.X, tmtk.Y, tmtk.WIDTH, tmtk.HEIGHT, tmtk.STYLE_CD, tmtk.FONT_SIZE, tmtk.FONT_COLOR, tmtk.FILL_COLOR, tmtk.IMG_NM, tmtk.IN_FG, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, tmtk.TUKEY_GRP_CD FROM TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY tmtk WHERE tmtk.STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPrtFormCopy */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRINT A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PRT_CLASS_CD , TEMPLT_REG_FG , TEMPLT_CD , PRT_FORM , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_PRINT A WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.PRT_CLASS_CD = A.PRT_CLASS_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.TEMPLT_REG_FG = B.TEMPLT_REG_FG , A.TEMPLT_CD = B.TEMPLT_CD , A.PRT_FORM = B.PRT_FORM , A.MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PRT_CLASS_CD , A.TEMPLT_REG_FG , A.TEMPLT_CD , A.PRT_FORM , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PRT_CLASS_CD , B.TEMPLT_REG_FG , B.TEMPLT_CD , B.PRT_FORM , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPromoStoreCopy */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_PROMO_STORE ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROMOTION_CD, STORE_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD, PROMOTION_CD, #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_HQ_PROMO_STORE WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPromoHCopy */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PROMO_H A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PROMOTION_CD , PROMOTION_NM , MEMO , AUTO_YN , USE_YN , OVERLAP_YN , REG_FG , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID , PROMO_TYPE FROM TB_MS_PROMO_H A WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.PROMOTION_CD = A.PROMOTION_CD ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PROMOTION_CD , A.PROMOTION_NM , A.MEMO , A.AUTO_YN , A.USE_YN , A.OVERLAP_YN , A.REG_FG , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.PROMO_TYPE ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PROMOTION_CD , B.PROMOTION_NM , B.MEMO , B.AUTO_YN , B.USE_YN , B.OVERLAP_YN , B.REG_FG , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID , B.PROMO_TYPE )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPromoBeneCopy */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PROMO_BENE A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PROMOTION_CD , BENE_SEQ , TYPE_CD , APPLY_DC_DS , DC_SET , PRESENT_DS , SELECT_GIFT_CNT , SELECT_CROSS_FG , PRINT_MESSAGE , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_PROMO_BENE A WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.PROMOTION_CD = A.PROMOTION_CD AND B.BENE_SEQ = A.BENE_SEQ ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PROMOTION_CD , A.BENE_SEQ , A.TYPE_CD , A.APPLY_DC_DS , A.DC_SET , A.PRESENT_DS , A.SELECT_GIFT_CNT , A.SELECT_CROSS_FG , A.PRINT_MESSAGE , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PROMOTION_CD , B.BENE_SEQ , B.TYPE_CD , B.APPLY_DC_DS , B.DC_SET , B.PRESENT_DS , B.SELECT_GIFT_CNT , B.SELECT_CROSS_FG , B.PRINT_MESSAGE , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPromoBeneProdCopy */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PROMO_BENE_PROD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PROMOTION_CD , PROD_CD , GIFT_QTY , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_MS_PROMO_BENE_PROD A WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.PROMOTION_CD = A.PROMOTION_CD AND B.PROD_CD = A.PROD_CD ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PROMOTION_CD , A.PROD_CD , A.GIFT_QTY , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PROMOTION_CD , B.PROD_CD , B.GIFT_QTY , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPromoCondiCopy */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PROMO_CONDI A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PROMOTION_CD , DATE_YN , START_YMD , END_YMD , TIME_YN , START_TIME , END_TIME , WEEK_YN , MON_YN , TUE_YN , WED_YN , THU_YN , FRI_YN , SAT_YN , SUN_YN , MEMBER_TARGET_DS , MEMBER_CLASS_CD , MIN_SALE_AMT , PROD_CD_YN , SELECT_PROD_DS , SELECT_CROSS_FG , SELECT_PROD_CNT , STORE_USE_YN , SIDE_PROD_FG , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID , PROD_SELECT_EXCEPT_FG , DLV1_YN , DLV2_YN , DLV3_YN , MAX_SALE_AMT , HQ_CHARGE_UPRC , MS_CHARGE_UPRC , PARTNER_CHARGE_UPRC , DLV4_YN , DLV5_YN , DLV6_YN , DLV7_YN , DLV8_YN , DLV9_YN , DLV10_YN , DLV11_YN , DLV12_YN , MOMS_PURCHS_CNT_LIMIT , MOMS_PURCHS_QTY_LIMIT , BLOCK_PAY_CD , DEPOSIT_YMD , DLV13_YN , DLV14_YN , DLV15_YN , CHARGE_DS , COUPON_YN FROM TB_MS_PROMO_CONDI A WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.PROMOTION_CD = A.PROMOTION_CD ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PROMOTION_CD , A.DATE_YN , A.START_YMD , A.END_YMD , A.TIME_YN , A.START_TIME , A.END_TIME , A.WEEK_YN , A.MON_YN , A.TUE_YN , A.WED_YN , A.THU_YN , A.FRI_YN , A.SAT_YN , A.SUN_YN , A.MEMBER_TARGET_DS , A.MEMBER_CLASS_CD , A.MIN_SALE_AMT , A.PROD_CD_YN , A.SELECT_PROD_DS , A.SELECT_CROSS_FG , A.SELECT_PROD_CNT , A.STORE_USE_YN , A.SIDE_PROD_FG , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.PROD_SELECT_EXCEPT_FG , A.DLV1_YN , A.DLV2_YN , A.DLV3_YN , A.MAX_SALE_AMT , A.HQ_CHARGE_UPRC , A.MS_CHARGE_UPRC , A.PARTNER_CHARGE_UPRC , A.DLV4_YN , A.DLV5_YN , A.DLV6_YN , A.DLV7_YN , A.DLV8_YN , A.DLV9_YN , A.DLV10_YN , A.DLV11_YN , A.DLV12_YN , A.MOMS_PURCHS_CNT_LIMIT , A.MOMS_PURCHS_QTY_LIMIT , A.BLOCK_PAY_CD , A.DEPOSIT_YMD , A.DLV13_YN , A.DLV14_YN , A.DLV15_YN , A.CHARGE_DS , A.COUPON_YN ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PROMOTION_CD , B.DATE_YN , B.START_YMD , B.END_YMD , B.TIME_YN , B.START_TIME , B.END_TIME , B.WEEK_YN , B.MON_YN , B.TUE_YN , B.WED_YN , B.THU_YN , B.FRI_YN , B.SAT_YN , B.SUN_YN , B.MEMBER_TARGET_DS , B.MEMBER_CLASS_CD , B.MIN_SALE_AMT , B.PROD_CD_YN , B.SELECT_PROD_DS , B.SELECT_CROSS_FG , B.SELECT_PROD_CNT , B.STORE_USE_YN , B.SIDE_PROD_FG , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID , B.PROD_SELECT_EXCEPT_FG , B.DLV1_YN , B.DLV2_YN , B.DLV3_YN , B.MAX_SALE_AMT , B.HQ_CHARGE_UPRC , B.MS_CHARGE_UPRC , B.PARTNER_CHARGE_UPRC , B.DLV4_YN , B.DLV5_YN , B.DLV6_YN , B.DLV7_YN , B.DLV8_YN , B.DLV9_YN , B.DLV10_YN , B.DLV11_YN , B.DLV12_YN , B.MOMS_PURCHS_CNT_LIMIT , B.MOMS_PURCHS_QTY_LIMIT , B.BLOCK_PAY_CD , B.DEPOSIT_YMD , B.DLV13_YN , B.DLV14_YN , B.DLV15_YN , B.CHARGE_DS , B.COUPON_YN )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPromoCondiProdCopy */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PROMO_CONDI_PROD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PROMOTION_CD , CONDI_PROD_SEQ , GUBUN_DS , PROD_CD , PROD_CLASS_CD , PROD_QTY , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID , APPLY_DC_DS , DC_SET FROM TB_MS_PROMO_CONDI_PROD A WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.PROMOTION_CD = A.PROMOTION_CD AND B.CONDI_PROD_SEQ = A.CONDI_PROD_SEQ ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PROMOTION_CD , A.CONDI_PROD_SEQ , A.GUBUN_DS , A.PROD_CD , A.PROD_CLASS_CD , A.PROD_QTY , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.APPLY_DC_DS , A.DC_SET ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PROMOTION_CD , B.CONDI_PROD_SEQ , B.GUBUN_DS , B.PROD_CD , B.PROD_CLASS_CD , B.PROD_QTY , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID , B.APPLY_DC_DS , B.DC_SET )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyDlvrProdCopy */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , PROD_CD , DLVR_NAME_CD , DLVR_PROD_NM , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID , DLVR_MAPPING_FG FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM WHERE STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND DLVR_NAME_CD IN (SELECT NMCODE_CD FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '112' AND NMCODE_CD != '1') ) B ON ( B.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND B.PROD_CD = A.PROD_CD AND B.DLVR_NAME_CD = A.DLVR_NAME_CD ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD , A.PROD_CD , A.DLVR_NAME_CD , A.DLVR_PROD_NM , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID , A.DLVR_MAPPING_FG ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD , B.PROD_CD , B.DLVR_NAME_CD , B.DLVR_PROD_NM , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID , B.DLVR_MAPPING_FG )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreConfig */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_STORE_ENVST ( STORE_CD, ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{envstCd}, #{envstVal}, #{dirctInYn}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertPosConfig */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_POS_ENVST tmpe USING DUAL ON ( tmpe.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmpe.POS_NO = #{posNo} AND tmpe.ENVST_CD = #{envstCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmpe.ENVST_VAL = #{envstVal}, tmpe.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tmpe.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, POS_NO, ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN, POS_FG, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{posNo}, #{envstCd}, #{envstVal}, #{dirctInYn}, #{posFg}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select:
/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getPosList */
SELECT ROWNUM, POS_NO, '['||POS_NO||']'||DECODE(POS_NM, NULL, 'POS'||POS_NO, POS_NM) AS POS_CD_NM, POS_NM FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd}
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.savePosTabGrp */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_POS_ENVST tme USING DUAL ON ( tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.POS_NO = #{posNo} AND tme.ENVST_CD = #{envstCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tme.ENVST_VAL = #{envstVal}, tme.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, tme.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, POS_NO, ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN, POS_FG, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{posNo}, #{envstCd}, #{envstVal}, 'N', '3', 'Y', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPosEnvInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_POS_ENVST ( STORE_CD, POS_NO, ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN, POS_FG, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, LPAD(#{targetPosNo}, 2, '0'), ENVST_CD, ENVST_VAL, DIRCT_IN_YN, POS_FG, USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_POS_ENVST WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND POS_NO = #{posNo}

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPosInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_POS ( STORE_CD, POS_NO, POS_NM, USE_YN, REMARK, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, LPAD(#{targetPosNo}, 2, '0'), ( SELECT POS_NM FROM TB_MS_POS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND POS_NO = #{posNo} ) , 'Y', 'POS'||#{targetPosNo}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyPosFunKeyInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_POS_FNKEY ( STORE_CD, POS_NO, FNKEY_NO, FNKEY_FG, DISP_SEQ, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{storeCd}, LPAD(#{targetPosNo}, 2, '0'), tpk.FNKEY_NO, tpk.FNKEY_FG, tpk.DISP_SEQ, tpk.X, tpk.Y, tpk.WIDTH, tpk.HEIGHT, tpk.STYLE_CD, tpk.USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_POS_FNKEY tpk, TB_MS_STORE_FNKEY tsf, TB_MS_POS_ENVST tpe WHERE 1=1 AND tpk.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tpk.POS_NO = #{posNo} AND tsf.STORE_CD = tpk.STORE_CD AND tsf.FNKEY_NO = tpk.FNKEY_NO AND tpe.ENVST_CD = '4019' AND tpe.STORE_CD = tpk.STORE_CD AND tpe.POS_NO = LPAD(#{targetPosNo}, 2, '0')

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertFuncKeyConfgXml */ MERGE INTO TB_WB_POS_CONFG_XML twpcx USING (SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, #{posNo} AS POS_NO, #{confgFg} AS CONFG_FG FROM DUAL ) tmp ON ( twpcx.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND twpcx.POS_NO = tmp.POS_NO AND twpcx.CONFG_FG = tmp.CONFG_FG ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET twpcx.XML = #{xml:CLOB}, twpcx.USE_YN = #{useYn}, twpcx.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, twpcx.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( twpcx.STORE_CD, twpcx.POS_NO, twpcx.CONFG_FG, twpcx.XML, twpcx.USE_YN, twpcx.REG_DT, twpcx.REG_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{posNo}, #{confgFg}, #{xml:CLOB}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId} )
mapper.select: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.getKitchenPrintInfo */ SELECT ROWNUM AS NO, tmp.STORE_CD, tmp.PRTER_NO, tmp.PRTER_NM, tmp.POS_NO, tmp.PRTER_KIND_FG, tmp.PRTER_PORT_FG, tmp.PRTER_SPEED_FG, tmp.PRTER_NET_IP, tmp.PRTER_NET_PORT, tmp.PRTER_OUTPUT_QTY, tmp.PRTER_CHECK_YN, tmp.USE_YN, tmp.PRTER_FG, tmp.PRTER_LABEL_KIND_FG, NVL(tmpr.CNT, 0) AS CNT FROM TB_MS_PRINTER tmp, (SELECT STORE_CD, PRTER_NO, COUNT(PROD_CD) AS CNT FROM TB_MS_PRINTER_PROD WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} GROUP BY STORE_CD, PRTER_NO ) tmpr WHERE tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmpr.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpr.PRTER_NO (+)= tmp.PRTER_NO ORDER BY PRTER_NO ASC
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertKitchenPrint */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_PRINTER ( STORE_CD, PRTER_NO, PRTER_NM, POS_NO, PRTER_KIND_FG, PRTER_PORT_FG, PRTER_SPEED_FG, PRTER_NET_IP, PRTER_NET_PORT, PRTER_OUTPUT_QTY, PRTER_CHECK_YN, USE_YN, PRTER_FG, PRTER_LABEL_KIND_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, LPAD(#{prterNo}, 2, '0'), #{prterNm}, #{posNo}, #{prterKindFg}, #{prterPortFg}, #{prterSpeedFg}, #{prterNetIp}, #{prterNetPort}, #{prterOutputQty}, #{prterCheckYn}, #{useYn}, #{prterFg}, #{prterLabelKindFg}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.update: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.updateKitchenPrint */ UPDATE TB_MS_PRINTER SET PRTER_NM = #{prterNm}, POS_NO = #{posNo}, PRTER_KIND_FG = #{prterKindFg}, PRTER_PORT_FG = #{prterPortFg}, PRTER_SPEED_FG = #{prterSpeedFg}, PRTER_NET_IP = #{prterNetIp}, PRTER_NET_PORT = #{prterNetPort}, PRTER_OUTPUT_QTY = #{prterOutputQty}, PRTER_CHECK_YN = #{prterCheckYn}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, PRTER_FG = #{prterFg}, PRTER_LABEL_KIND_FG = #{prterLabelKindFg}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND PRTER_NO = #{prterNo}
mapper.select:
/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getPrintProductInfo */ SELECT STORE_CD, PROD_CD, PROD_NM, PROD_CLASS_CD, #{prterNo} AS PRTER_NO FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND PROD_CD IN (SELECT PROD_CD FROM TB_MS_PRINTER_PROD WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND PRTER_NO = #{prterNo})
AND PROD_CD NOT IN (SELECT PROD_CD FROM TB_MS_PRINTER_PROD WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND PRTER_NO = #{prterNo})
AND PROD_NM LIKE '%'|| #{prodNm} ||'%'
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertKitchenPrintProduct */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRINTER_PROD USING DUAL ON ( STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND PRTER_NO = #{prterNo} AND PROD_CD = #{prodCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, PRTER_NO, PROD_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{prterNo}, #{prodCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.getHqList */ SELECT '' AS VALUE, '선택' AS NAME FROM DUAL UNION SELECT HQ_OFFICE_CD AS VALUE, '[' || HQ_OFFICE_CD || '] ' || HQ_OFFICE_NM AS NAME FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE ORDER BY VALUE NULLS FIRST, VALUE ASC

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getTouchKeyStoreList */ SELECT '' AS VALUE, '선택' AS NAME FROM DUAL UNION SELECT STORE_CD AS VALUE, '[' || STORE_CD || '] ' || STORE_NM AS NAME FROM TB_MS_STORE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ORDER BY VALUE NULLS FIRST, VALUE ASC

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getVanCornrList */ SELECT tms.STORE_CD, NVL2( tmc.CORNR_CD, tmc.CORNR_CD, '00' ) AS CORNR_CD, NVL2( tmc.CORNR_NM, tmc.CORNR_NM, '기본코너') AS CORNR_NM, NVL2( tmc.OWNER_NM, tmc.OWNER_NM, tms.OWNER_NM) AS OWNER_NM, NVL2( tmc.BIZ_NO, tmc.BIZ_NO, tms.BIZ_NO ) AS BIZ_NO, NVL2( tmc.TEL_NO, tmc.TEL_NO, tms.TEL_NO ) AS TEL_NO, NVL2( tmc.VAN_CD, tmc.VAN_CD, '' ) AS VAN_CD, NVL2( tmc.VAN_SER_NO, tmc.VAN_SER_NO, '' ) AS VAN_SER_NO, NVL2( tmc.VAN_TERMNL_NO, tmc.VAN_TERMNL_NO, '') AS VAN_TERMNL_NO FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_MS_CORNER tmc WHERE tmc.STORE_CD (+)= tms.STORE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmc.CORNR_CD (+)= '00'

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.avlblMenu */ SELECT twr.* FROM ( SELECT twr.RESRCE_CD AS RESRCE_CD_LARGE, twr.RESRCE_NM AS RESRCE_NM_LARGE, twri.RESRCE_CD AS RESRCE_CD_MID, twri.RESRCE_NM AS RESRCE_NM_MID, twrif.RESRCE_CD AS RESRCE_CD_SMALL, twrif.RESRCE_NM AS RESRCE_NM_SMALL FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twr, TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twri, TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twrif WHERE 1=1 AND twr.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twri.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twrif.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twri.P_RESRCE = twr.RESRCE_CD AND twrif.P_RESRCE = twri.RESRCE_CD AND (twr.SPCL_AUTHOR IS NULL OR twr.SPCL_AUTHOR NOT IN ('A01')) AND twrif.DISP_LEVEL = '3' ORDER BY twr.RESRCE_CD, twri.RESRCE_CD, twrif.RESRCE_CD ) twr, ( SELECT twa.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu, TB_WB_AUTHOR_GRP_RESRCE twa WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID AND twa.AUTH_GRP_CD = twu.AUTH_GRP_CD AND twa.USE_YN = 'Y' MINUS SELECT twa.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu, TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT_V01 twa WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID AND twa.USER_ID = twu.USER_ID AND twa.INCLD_EXCLD_FG = 'E' AND twa.USE_YN = 'Y' ) tme WHERE tme.RESRCE_CD = twr.RESRCE_CD_SMALL

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.beUseMenu */ SELECT twr.* FROM ( SELECT twr.RESRCE_CD AS RESRCE_CD_LARGE, twr.RESRCE_NM AS RESRCE_NM_LARGE, twri.RESRCE_CD AS RESRCE_CD_MID, twri.RESRCE_NM AS RESRCE_NM_MID, twrif.RESRCE_CD AS RESRCE_CD_SMALL, twrif.RESRCE_NM AS RESRCE_NM_SMALL FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twr, TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twri, TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twrif WHERE 1=1 AND twr.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twri.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twrif.USE_YN = 'Y' AND twri.P_RESRCE = twr.RESRCE_CD AND twrif.P_RESRCE = twri.RESRCE_CD AND (twr.SPCL_AUTHOR IS NULL OR twr.SPCL_AUTHOR NOT IN ('A01')) AND twrif.DISP_LEVEL = '3' ORDER BY twr.RESRCE_CD, twri.RESRCE_CD, twrif.RESRCE_CD ) twr, ( SELECT twa.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu, TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT_V01 twa WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID AND twa.USER_ID = twu.USER_ID AND twa.INCLD_EXCLD_FG = 'E' AND twa.USE_YN = 'Y' ) tme WHERE tme.RESRCE_CD = twr.RESRCE_CD_SMALL
mapper.insert:
/* USE : StoreManageMapper.copyAuthExcp */
MERGE INTO TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT twa USING DUAL ON ( twa.USER_ID = ( SELECT tme.USER_ID FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID) AND twa.RESRCE_CD = #{resrceCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET twa.INCLD_EXCLD_FG = #{incldExcldFg}, twa.USE_YN = #{useYn}, twa.MOD_DT = #{modDt}, twa.MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USER_ID, RESRCE_CD, INCLD_EXCLD_FG, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID) VALUES ( (SELECT tme.USER_ID FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID), #{resrceCd}, #{incldExcldFg}, #{useYn}, #{regDt}, #{regId} )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.addAuth */ INSERT INTO TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT ( USER_ID, RESRCE_CD, INCLD_EXCLD_FG, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( (SELECT tme.USER_ID FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID), #{resrceCd}, #{incldExcldFg}, 'Y', #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.isAuth */ SELECT COUNT(RESRCE_CD) AS CNT FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT_V01 WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT twu.USER_ID FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID) AND RESRCE_CD = #{resrceCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.exceptMenu */ SELECT USER_ID, RESRCE_CD, INCLD_EXCLD_FG, USE_YN FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT_V01 WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT twu.USER_ID FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{copyStoreCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID) AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.delete: /* HqManageMapper.removeAuthAll */ DELETE TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT WHERE USER_ID = (SELECT twu.USER_ID FROM TB_MS_EMPLOYEE tme, TB_WB_USER_INFO twu WHERE tme.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tme.EMP_NO = '0000' AND twu.USER_ID = tme.USER_ID)
mapper.select: /* StoreManageMapper.bizNoCheckCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS BIZ_NO FROM ( SELECT 'H' AS STORE_FG, tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AS STORE_CD, tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM AS STORE_NM, tho.OWNER_NM, tho.BIZ_NO, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '005' AND NMCODE_CD = tho.SYS_STAT_FG) AS SYS_STAT_FG_NM, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '001' AND NMCODE_CD = tho.CLS_FG) AS CLS_FG_NM FROM TB_HQ_OFFICE tho WHERE tho.BIZ_NO = #{bizNo} UNION ALL SELECT 'S' AS STORE_FG, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tms.OWNER_NM, tms.BIZ_NO, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '005' AND NMCODE_CD = tms.SYS_STAT_FG) AS SYS_STAT_FG_NM, (SELECT NMCODE_NM FROM TB_CM_NMCODE WHERE NMCODE_GRP_CD = '001' AND NMCODE_CD = tms.CLS_FG) AS CLS_FG_NM FROM TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE tms.BIZ_NO = #{bizNo} )
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqSetConfigProd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_UNITST_PROD tmpup USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, UNIT_PROD_CD, SET_PROD_FG, UNIT_PROD_QTY, DISP_SEQ, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_UNITST_PROD WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) thpup ON ( tmpup.STORE_CD = thpup.STORE_CD AND tmpup.PROD_CD = thpup.PROD_CD AND tmpup.UNIT_PROD_CD = thpup.UNIT_PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET tmpup.SET_PROD_FG = thpup.SET_PROD_FG, tmpup.UNIT_PROD_QTY = thpup.UNIT_PROD_QTY, tmpup.DISP_SEQ = thpup.DISP_SEQ, tmpup.MOD_DT = thpup.MOD_DT, tmpup.MOD_ID = thpup.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( tmpup.STORE_CD, tmpup.PROD_CD, tmpup.UNIT_PROD_CD, tmpup.SET_PROD_FG, tmpup.UNIT_PROD_QTY, tmpup.DISP_SEQ, tmpup.REG_DT, tmpup.REG_ID, tmpup.MOD_DT, tmpup.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( thpup.STORE_CD, thpup.PROD_CD, thpup.UNIT_PROD_CD, thpup.SET_PROD_FG, thpup.UNIT_PROD_QTY, thpup.DISP_SEQ, thpup.REG_DT, thpup.REG_ID, thpup.MOD_DT, thpup.MOD_ID )
mapper.select:
/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getErpStore */
SELECT A.BBQ_STORE_CD, A.STORE_NM, A.BIZ_STORE_NM, A.OWNER_NM, A.AREA_CD, A.DIRECT_MANAGE_YN, A.POS_CNT, A.BIZ_NO, A.TEL_NO, A.MP_NO, A.POST_NO, A.ADDR, A.ADDR_DTL, B.VAN_NM, A.VAN_CD, C.AGENCY_NM, A.AGENCY_CD, CASE WHEN A.STORE_FG = '1' AND A.NXPOS_STORE_CD IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS REG_YN, NVL(A.MAP_STORE_CD, A.BBQ_STORE_CD) AS MAP_STORE_CD
FROM IFB_MS_BBQ_STORE A, TB_CM_VAN_CMPNY B, ( SELECT AGENCY_CD, AGENCY_NM FROM TB_CM_AGENCY WHERE P_AGENCY_CD IS NOT NULL ) C WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND B.VAN_FG (+)= '01' AND B.VAN_CD (+)= A.VAN_CD AND C.AGENCY_CD (+)= A.AGENCY_CD
AND A.BBQ_STORE_CD LIKE '%'|| #{srchStoreCd} ||'%'
AND A.STORE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{srchStoreNm} ||'%'
AND A.BIZ_NO LIKE '%'|| #{bizNo} ||'%'
AND (A.STORE_FG != '1' OR A.STORE_FG IS NULL) AND A.NXPOS_STORE_CD IS NULL
AND A.STORE_FG = '1' AND A.NXPOS_STORE_CD IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY BBQ_STORE_CD ASC

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.getUseMainPos */ SELECT POS_NO FROM ( SELECT tmp.POS_NO FROM TB_MS_POS_ENVST tmpe, TB_MS_POS tmp WHERE tmpe.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpe.POS_NO = tmp.POS_NO AND tmpe.ENVST_CD = '4019' AND tmpe.ENVST_VAL != '6' AND tmp.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tmp.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY tmp.POS_NO ) WHERE ROWNUM < 2
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductRecpOrigin */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_RECP_ORIGIN A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, RECIPES_CD, RECIPES_NM, ORGPLCE_NM, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_RECP_ORIGIN WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.RECIPES_CD = B.RECIPES_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET RECIPES_NM = B.RECIPES_NM, ORGPLCE_NM = B.ORGPLCE_NM, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.RECIPES_CD, A.RECIPES_NM, A.ORGPLCE_NM, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.RECIPES_CD, B.RECIPES_NM, B.ORGPLCE_NM, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductRecpProd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_RECP_PROD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, RECIPES_CD, PROD_CD, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, RECP_SEQ FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_RECP_PROD WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.RECIPES_CD = B.RECIPES_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, RECP_SEQ = B.RECP_SEQ WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.RECIPES_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.RECP_SEQ ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.RECIPES_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.RECP_SEQ )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductAlgiInfo */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_ALGI_INFO A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, RECIPES_CD, RECIPES_NM, ALLERGIE_NM, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_ALGI_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.RECIPES_CD = B.RECIPES_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET RECIPES_NM = B.RECIPES_NM, ALLERGIE_NM = B.ALLERGIE_NM, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.RECIPES_CD, A.RECIPES_NM, A.ALLERGIE_NM, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.RECIPES_CD, B.RECIPES_NM, B.ALLERGIE_NM, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductAlgiProd */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_ALGI_PROD A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, RECIPES_CD, PROD_CD, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, RECP_SEQ FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_ALGI_PROD WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.RECIPES_CD = B.RECIPES_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, RECP_SEQ = B.RECP_SEQ WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.RECIPES_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.RECP_SEQ ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.RECIPES_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.RECP_SEQ )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductImage */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_IMAGE A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, IMG_FG, IMG_URL, IMG_FILE_NM, IMG_CHG_DT, REMARK, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD AND A.IMG_FG = B.IMG_FG ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET IMG_URL = B.IMG_URL, IMG_FILE_NM = B.IMG_FILE_NM, IMG_CHG_DT = B.IMG_CHG_DT, REMARK = B.REMARK, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.IMG_FG, A.IMG_URL, A.IMG_FILE_NM, A.IMG_CHG_DT, A.REMARK, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.IMG_FG, B.IMG_URL, B.IMG_FILE_NM, B.IMG_CHG_DT, B.REMARK, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqProductDlvrProdNm */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM A USING ( SELECT #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD, PROD_CD, DLVR_NAME_CD, DLVR_PROD_NM, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, DLVR_MAPPING_FG FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_DLVR_PROD_NM WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD AND A.DLVR_NAME_CD = B.DLVR_NAME_CD AND A.PROD_CD = B.PROD_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DLVR_PROD_NM = B.DLVR_PROD_NM, MOD_DT = B.MOD_DT, MOD_ID = B.MOD_ID, DLVR_MAPPING_FG = B.DLVR_MAPPING_FG WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.STORE_CD, A.PROD_CD, A.DLVR_NAME_CD, A.DLVR_PROD_NM, A.REG_DT, A.REG_ID, A.MOD_DT, A.MOD_ID, A.DLVR_MAPPING_FG ) VALUES ( B.STORE_CD, B.PROD_CD, B.DLVR_NAME_CD, B.DLVR_PROD_NM, B.REG_DT, B.REG_ID, B.MOD_DT, B.MOD_ID, B.DLVR_MAPPING_FG )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreHqAdver */ MERGE INTO TB_HQ_POS_ADVER_STORE A USING ( SELECT #{hqOfficeCd} AS HQ_OFFICE_CD , ADVER_FILE_NO , #{storeCd} AS STORE_CD , #{regDt} AS REG_DT , #{regId} AS REG_ID , #{modDt} AS MOD_DT , #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM TB_HQ_POS_ADVER_FILE WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ) B ON ( A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = B.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND A.ADVER_FILE_NO = B.ADVER_FILE_NO AND A.STORE_CD = B.STORE_CD ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.HQ_OFFICE_CD , A.ADVER_FILE_NO , A.STORE_CD , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.MOD_DT , A.MOD_ID ) VALUES ( B.HQ_OFFICE_CD , B.ADVER_FILE_NO , B.STORE_CD , B.REG_DT , B.REG_ID , B.MOD_DT , B.MOD_ID )

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertTmpStoreTouchKeyClass */ INSERT INTO TB_TMP_TOUCH_KEY_CLASS( SESSION_ID, SEQ, STORE_CD, TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_NM, PAGE_NO, PAGE_ROWS, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT #{sessionId}, ROWNUM, STORE_CD, TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_NM, PAGE_NO, PAGE_ROWS, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} FROM TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ORDER BY TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD

/* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertTmpStoreTouchKey */ INSERT INTO TB_TMP_TOUCH_KEY( SESSION_ID, SEQ, STORE_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CD, TUKEY_FG, PROD_CD, PAGE_NO, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, TUKEY_GRP_CD ) SELECT #{sessionId}, ROWNUM, STORE_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CD, TUKEY_FG, PROD_CD, PAGE_NO, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, TUKEY_GRP_CD FROM TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ORDER BY TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CD
mapper.update: /* StoreManageMapper.chgSortStoreTouchKeyClass */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY_CLASS( STORE_CD, TUKEY_GRP_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_NM, PAGE_NO, PAGE_ROWS, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) SELECT tmtkc.STORE_CD, tmtkc.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tmtkc.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tmtkc.TUKEY_CLASS_NM, tmtkc.PAGE_NO, tmtkc.PAGE_ROWS, tmtkc.X, tmtkc.Y, tmtkc.WIDTH, tmtkc.HEIGHT, tmtkc.STYLE_CD, tmtkc.FONT_SIZE, tmtkc.FONT_COLOR, tmtkc.FILL_COLOR, tmtkc.IMG_NM, tmtkc.IN_FG, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID FROM ( SELECT tttkc.GRP_ID, tttkc.STORE_CD, tttkc.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttkc.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttkc.TUKEY_CLASS_NM, FLOOR((tttkc.GRP_ID-1) / (5*(TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1))+1 AS PAGE_NO, #{envstVal} AS PAGE_ROWS, MOD(MOD(tttkc.GRP_ID-1,5*(TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1),5) * 100 AS X, (FLOOR(MOD(tttkc.GRP_ID-1,5*(TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1)/5)) * 61 AS Y, '99' AS WIDTH, '60' AS HEIGHT, tttkc.STYLE_CD, tttkc.FONT_SIZE, tttkc.FONT_COLOR, tttkc.FILL_COLOR, tttkc.IMG_NM, tttkc.IN_FG FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY tttkc.TUKEY_GRP_CD ORDER BY tttkc.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttkc.TUKEY_CLASS_CD) AS GRP_ID, tttkc.* FROM TB_TMP_TOUCH_KEY_CLASS tttkc WHERE tttkc.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND tttkc.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ORDER BY tttkc.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttkc.TUKEY_CLASS_CD ) tttkc ) tmtkc WHERE 6 > tmtkc.PAGE_NO

/* StoreManageMapper.chgSortStoreTouchKey01 */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY( STORE_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CD, TUKEY_FG, PROD_CD, PAGE_NO, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, TUKEY_GRP_CD ) SELECT tmtk.STORE_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_FG, tmtk.PROD_CD, tmtk.PAGE_NO, tmtk.X, tmtk.Y, tmtk.WIDTH, tmtk.HEIGHT, tmtk.STYLE_CD, tmtk.FONT_SIZE, tmtk.FONT_COLOR, tmtk.FILL_COLOR, tmtk.IMG_NM, tmtk.IN_FG, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, tmtk.TUKEY_GRP_CD FROM ( SELECT tttk.GRP_ID, tttk.STORE_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD, tttk.TUKEY_FG, tttk.PROD_CD, FLOOR((tttk.GRP_ID-1) / (5*(8-TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1))+1 AS PAGE_NO, MOD(MOD(tttk.GRP_ID-1,5*(8-TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1),5) * 100 AS X, (FLOOR(MOD(tttk.GRP_ID-1,5*(8-TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1)/5)) * 75 AS Y, '99' AS WIDTH, '74' AS HEIGHT, tttk.STYLE_CD, tttk.FONT_SIZE, tttk.FONT_COLOR, tttk.FILL_COLOR, tttk.IMG_NM, tttk.IN_FG, tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD ORDER BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD) AS GRP_ID, tttk.* FROM TB_TMP_TOUCH_KEY tttk WHERE tttk.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND tttk.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tttk.TUKEY_FG = '01' ORDER BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD ) tttk ) tmtk WHERE 6 > tmtk.PAGE_NO

/* StoreManageMapper.chgSortStoreTouchKey02 */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY( STORE_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CD, TUKEY_FG, PROD_CD, PAGE_NO, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, TUKEY_GRP_CD ) SELECT tmtk.STORE_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_FG, tmtk.PROD_CD, tmtk.PAGE_NO, tmtk.X, tmtk.Y, tmtk.WIDTH, tmtk.HEIGHT, tmtk.STYLE_CD, tmtk.FONT_SIZE, tmtk.FONT_COLOR, tmtk.FILL_COLOR, tmtk.IMG_NM, tmtk.IN_FG, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, tmtk.TUKEY_GRP_CD FROM ( SELECT tttk.GRP_ID, tttk.STORE_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD, tttk.TUKEY_FG, tttk.PROD_CD, FLOOR((tttk.GRP_ID-1) / (5*(8-TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1))+1 AS PAGE_NO, '5' AS X, '5' AS Y, '89' AS WIDTH, '64' AS HEIGHT, tttk.STYLE_CD, tttk.FONT_SIZE, tttk.FONT_COLOR, tttk.FILL_COLOR, tttk.IMG_NM, tttk.IN_FG, tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD ORDER BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD) AS GRP_ID, tttk.* FROM TB_TMP_TOUCH_KEY tttk WHERE tttk.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND tttk.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tttk.TUKEY_FG = '02' ORDER BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD ) tttk ) tmtk WHERE 6 > tmtk.PAGE_NO

/* StoreManageMapper.chgSortStoreTouchKey03 */ INSERT INTO TB_MS_TOUCH_KEY( STORE_CD, TUKEY_CLASS_CD, TUKEY_CD, TUKEY_FG, PROD_CD, PAGE_NO, X, Y, WIDTH, HEIGHT, STYLE_CD, FONT_SIZE, FONT_COLOR, FILL_COLOR, IMG_NM, IN_FG, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, TUKEY_GRP_CD ) SELECT tmtk.STORE_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_CD, tmtk.TUKEY_FG, tmtk.PROD_CD, tmtk.PAGE_NO, tmtk.X, tmtk.Y, tmtk.WIDTH, tmtk.HEIGHT, tmtk.STYLE_CD, tmtk.FONT_SIZE, tmtk.FONT_COLOR, tmtk.FILL_COLOR, tmtk.IMG_NM, tmtk.IN_FG, #{regDt} AS REG_DT, #{regId} AS REG_ID, #{modDt} AS MOD_DT, #{modId} AS MOD_ID, tmtk.TUKEY_GRP_CD FROM ( SELECT tttk.GRP_ID, tttk.STORE_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD, tttk.TUKEY_FG, tttk.PROD_CD, FLOOR((tttk.GRP_ID-1) / (5*(8-TO_NUMBER(#{envstVal}))-1))+1 AS PAGE_NO, 94 - (LENGTH(tmpsp.SALE_UPRC) * 10) AS X, '49' AS Y, (LENGTH(tmpsp.SALE_UPRC) * 10) AS WIDTH, '20' AS HEIGHT, tttk.STYLE_CD, tttk.FONT_SIZE, tttk.FONT_COLOR, tttk.FILL_COLOR, tttk.IMG_NM, tttk.IN_FG, tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tmpsp.SALE_UPRC FROM ( SELECT RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD ORDER BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD) AS GRP_ID, tttk.* FROM TB_TMP_TOUCH_KEY tttk WHERE tttk.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND tttk.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tttk.TUKEY_FG = '03' ORDER BY tttk.TUKEY_GRP_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CLASS_CD, tttk.TUKEY_CD ) tttk, TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp WHERE tttk.STORE_CD = tmpsp.STORE_CD AND tttk.PROD_CD = tmpsp.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') ) tmtk WHERE 6 > tmtk.PAGE_NO
mapper.insert: /* USE : StoreManageMapper.insertStoreMemberClass */ INSERT INTO TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS ( MEMBR_ORGN_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_CD, MEMBR_CLASS_NM, DC_RATE, POINT_SAVE_FG, DEFLT_YN, NEW_JOIN_SAVE_POINT, FIRST_SALE_SAVE_POINT, MIN_USE_POINT, ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG, ANVSR_SAVE_POINT, USE_YN, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, REG_STORE_CD ) SELECT #{membrOrgnCd}, (SELECT LPAD( NVL(MAX(MEMBR_CLASS_CD), 0) + 1, 3, '0') FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd}), MEMBR_CLASS_NM, DC_RATE, POINT_SAVE_FG, DEFLT_YN, NEW_JOIN_SAVE_POINT, FIRST_SALE_SAVE_POINT, MIN_USE_POINT, ANVSR_POINT_SAVE_FG, ANVSR_SAVE_POINT, USE_YN, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, #{storeCd} FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_CLASS WHERE MEMBR_ORGN_CD = '0000000' AND MEMBR_CLASS_CD = '000'
mapper.select: /* StoreManageMapper.getBranchCombo */ SELECT '' AS VALUE, '선택' AS NAME FROM DUAL UNION SELECT BRANCH_CD AS VALUE, BRANCH_NM AS NAME FROM TB_HQ_BRANCH_MOMS WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} ORDER BY VALUE NULLS FIRST
mapper.insert: /* StoreManageMapper.mergeStoreInfoAddMoms */ MERGE INTO TB_MS_STORE_INFO USING DUAL ON ( STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET MOMS_TEAM = #{momsTeam}, MOMS_AC_SHOP = #{momsAcShop}, MOMS_AREA_FG = #{momsAreaFg}, MOMS_COMMERCIAL = #{momsCommercial}, MOMS_SHOP_TYPE = #{momsShopType}, MOMS_STORE_MANAGE_TYPE = #{momsStoreManageType}, MOD_ID = #{modId}, MOD_DT = #{modDt} WHERE 1=1 AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, MOMS_TEAM, MOMS_AC_SHOP, MOMS_AREA_FG, MOMS_COMMERCIAL, MOMS_SHOP_TYPE, MOMS_STORE_MANAGE_TYPE, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{momsTeam}, #{momsAcShop}, #{momsAreaFg}, #{momsCommercial}, #{momsShopType}, #{momsStoreManageType}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: /* StoreManageMapper.getHqBrandCdComboList */ SELECT thb.HQ_BRAND_CD AS VALUE, thb.HQ_BRAND_NM AS NAME FROM TB_HQ_BRAND thb WHERE 1=1 AND thb.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thb.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY thb.HQ_BRAND_CD
